# Pass.Locations

**Object**

An object that represents a location that the system uses to show a relevant pass.

## Declaration

```swift
object Pass.Locations
```

## Adding relevance

- **Showing a Pass on the Lock Screen**: Add information to your pass so the system can display it on the Lock Screen at a relevant time and place.
- **Pass.Beacons**: An object that represents the identifier of a Bluetooth Low Energy beacon the system uses to show a relevant pass.
- **Pass.RelevantDates**: An object that represents a date interval that the system uses to show a relevant pass.
